channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Motive sought after suspect in Brown shooting, MIT professor's murder found dead

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Justice Department releases initial trove of Epstein files under new law
item.description: The Justice Department has released records from the Epstein files, the first documents to come to light under a new law signed by President Trump. Fo...

item.title: Suspect in Brown University shooting and MIT professor’s killing was once a physics student
CPI report shows the inflation rate rose at a 2.7% pace in November
item.description: Economists had expected CPI to rise at an annual rate of 3% last month.

item.title: How one anonymous tipster cracked the Brown University shooting case
Trump reaches deal with 9 major drugmakers to lower prices
item.description: Nine drug manufacturers will offer their drugs to Medicaid recipients at most-favored-nation discounts in exchange for tariff exemptions.

item.title: Brown, MIT suspect had 200 rounds as authorities feared hit list: Official

item.title: WATCH: Work begins to rename Kennedy Center as 'Trump-Kennedy Center'

item.title: Here's how much ACA costs would have risen this year without subsidies
item.description: Millions of people with an Affordable Care Act health plan face a massive jump in premiums next year — this chart shows just how much.

item.title: WATCH: Deaf Santa delivers hope to hard of hearing children for the holidays
item.description: Charles Graves, also known as Deaf Santa, shows his journey of bringing Christmas magic in the new documentary, 'Deaf Santa Claus.'

item.title: Epstein files: DOJ begins releasing documents
item.description: The DOJ has begun publicly releasing what an official said Friday would be "several hundred thousand" documents from its Epstein files.
